user_instruction: 'Update Tom at Hope and Recovery Network (tom@hopeandrecovery.org) on our community'"'"'s current situation and Path to Sobriety'"'"'s recent activities. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Update Needed for Tom (Hope and Recovery Network)

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! Could you please put together a brief update for Tom at Hope and Recovery Network (tom@hopeandrecovery.org) covering:

• Our community’s current situation (any notable developments, needs, or success stories)  
• The latest activities and accomplishments from Path to Sobriety

All the source details are in my Notion workspace, so feel free to pull anything you need from there. If you could send the update to Tom (and cc me) by the end of the week, that would be wonderful.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best,  
[Your Name]
